metadata.Title: CVE-2018-9138 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in cplus-dem.c in GNU libiberty, as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29 and 2.30. Stack Exhaustion occurs in the C++ demangling functions provided by libiberty, and there are recursive stack frames: demangle_nested_args, demangle_args, do_arg, and do_type.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> same libiberty commit as CVE-2018-12641

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.32-7ubuntu4').
